thread.title: French police kill gunman after hostage-taking

title: French police kill gunman after hostage-taking
text:
French police kill gunman after hostage-taking Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:28 
French police have killed a gunman holed up in a supermarket after he took a number of people hostage, and at least three other people have been killed. The incident is being treated as an act of terrorism. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
French police have killed a gunman holed up in a supermarket after he took a number of people hostage, and at least three other people have been killed. The incident is being treated as an act of terrorism. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2GmrjC5
